story:
Short Summary

Thank you for taking the time to look at our campaign! Hopefully you've seen our campaign video at the top of the page where you can see our concept footage we shot to give people an idea of what the tone and style our short will be. A big thank you to the actors Nicholas Finlayson and Brian Beatty for helping us make the concept footage! 

Now for some info on us and our project. Zach, Brandon, and I (Mitchell) are great friends and have been working on films together since we were in high school. As we got older, our films got better and more mature. We believe we are ready to take it to the next step with this project. Titled "Water", this will be our most ambitious project to date and we can't be more excited about it!

"Water" is a short film that takes place in a time when water is incredibly scarce and follows four men as they find themselves struggling to survive. But it's more than just a simple story of survival. The short will deal with themes of life and death, fate and choices. Do our decisions matter, or is everything predetermined? This is the question our film will explore.

This project will mark the first time we'll have a budget for a film. In the past, we've done everything guerrilla style. We want "Water" to be different. We want to tell the story properly, and in order for that to happen we need help funding the film. That's where you all come in!

By helping us fund this movie, you are allowing us to bring this story to life. The ability to turn an idea into a living, breathing, tangible work of art. That's the beauty of film, people coming together to make something out of nothing. We are extremely passionate about what we do. This is our love. We can assure you that we will do our best to bring you something special.

What We Need & What You Get

We would love to raise $5,000 to cover the costs of:

• Equipment (Cameras, lenses, etc.)
• Props
• Hair, Makeup, and Costumes
• Sets and Locations
• Food for Actors and Crew
• Compensation for Actors and Crew

Should we not reach our entire goal of $5,000, we will distribute the funds where they are needed most and ensure that the finished product will still be of quality.

No donation is too small! Every dollar counts and will help us tell the story the best way we can.

As a thank you, we have a number of perks available to show you our gratitude! Find out what they are in the Perks Column!

Who You're Putting Your Trust In

The three of us have extensive experience in putting projects together. Together we have worked on weekly programming and short films for the past six years. We put hundreds of hours into our project for little or no return because of our undying love for the art. We can't promise that this will be the greatest short film ever made, but we can promise we will certainly die trying!

Risks & Challenges

Along the way, as with any film, we will encounter obstacles. A major challenge for us will be scheduling. When filming begins, school will be in and all of our cast and crew have personal lives they have to attend to. To overcome this, we will be shooting on weekends. This will drag the filming process out, but will allow us a week between shoots to edit footage we already have to determine any reshoots we may have to take, or give us an idea of how the film is shaping up. 

Another challenge is our small crew. Only 5 to 10 people make up our crew, but because of our histories as run n' gun, guerrilla filmmakers, we have become Jacks of all trades. We have learned to embrace our small numbers and not let it be a weakness.

The remaining large challenge will be building the major set piece. Our story revolves around a shack. This will take time and funds to bring to life the way we envision it for the story. Once we have the materials, Zach and Michael, our friends and all around smart guys, will be able to easily build the set because of their backgrounds as handymen.

Despite these and any other obstacles we may face, we will overcome them because of our determination and preparation.

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you can't donate but still want to help us reach our goal. If so, just share this campaign to social media sites! Facebook pages and friends, Twitter, and even email! Spreading the word is very helpful! Thanks again for your donations!

story:
Greetings Everyone, 

It has been a productive and innovative first season and we are willing to re-produce this success  in a second season that will be even greater reaching a million times more listeners and viewers. 

We would like to produce original short documentaries and reports on the news and updates on extremely advanced science innovations.

If someone asks for supports, this means this someone truly needs the support.

Thanks for your support in advance. Please donate today. You will receive a tax deductible receipt.

Respectful Regards, 

Frederic Eger
Creator, Producer & Host, 
Quantum Earth

Quantum Earth Radio: www.live365.com/stations/quantumearth

Now Available at IMDB, Quantum Earth Season I Episodes:

Quantum Earth s01e07 ‪#‎Interplanetary‬ ‪#‎Colonization‬ & ‪#‎Survival‬: imdb.com/video/wab/vi3273765657

Quantum Earth (s01e06) ‪#‎Interstellar‬ ‪#‎Travel‬ & ‪#‎Freedom‬: imdb.com/video/wab/vi1020179225

Quantum Earth (s01e05) ‪#‎Dimensions‬ & ‪#‎Love‬: imdb.com/video/wab/vi1429910297

Quantum Earth (s01e04) ‪#‎TimeTravel‬ & ‪#‎Karma‬: imdb.com/video/wab/vi3291788057

Quantum Earth (s01e03) ‪#‎Matter‬ & ‪#‎Subsistence‬: imdb.com/video/wab/vi986624793

Quantum Earth (s01e02) ‪#‎Matrix‬ & #Freedom: imdb.com/video/imdb/vi2082845465

Quantum Earth (s01e01) ‪#‎Disclosure‬ & ‪#‎Identity‬: imdb.com/video/wab/vi1310962457

Created by Frederic Eger (c) Frederic Eger - Eger Shows - 2015 - 2016

www.vimeo.com/quantumearth

www.live365.com/stations/quantumearth

http://www.live365.com/web/components/content/other/players.live

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/live365-radio/id301645072?mt=8

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=c...

The news-talk show magazine "Quantum Earth" explores in 120 minutes on the  radio explores the answers science and spirituality provide to Human Needs.

The show features scientists, experts and intellectuals who work on improving our daily lives as Humans by conducting researches out of the comfort zone, the norm and come with innovative solutions.

Frederic Eger Background

Journalist, Director & Producer.

Trilingual in French, English and Spanish,

Member of the French Directors Guild

Member of the Tel Aviv Journalist Union

Mermber of the Latvian Journalists Union

Member of the Isreal Film & TV Directors Guild

Member of the International News Safety Institute

Member of the French Society of Still Images (SAIF).

Member of the Civil Society of Multimedia Authors (SCAM)

EXPERIENCE

Jan 2015 – Present Radio Host & Producer – Online: Producing independently a news talk-show on spirituality entitled Quantum Earth.


April 2014 – Nov 2014 Corporate Journalist & Newscast Producer - Planet Option News - Jerusalem, Israel: Producing daily newscasts. and updates on the stock markets in French and English writing news stories, selecting footage to include in broadcasts, reviewing sound bites, film editing, voicing-over the stories.


Nov. 2006 – Dec. 2012 Film Director / Eger Films (France) Clients : SFTFP, AIPCF, Paris Lawyer.fr - Paris, France: Producing and Directing on assignment industrials, short documentaries, commercials, billboards, corporate films for doctors, attorneys, accountants, small businesses and non-profit organizations.


August 2012 Film Director (Documentary) / Clients: Divine Revelation - Paris, France Co-Directing with Dr Susan Shumsky, Film Editing and Executive Producing of a documentary entitled New Humanity on the 2012 apocalyptical theories with experts.


Spring 2009 Film Director (Feature Documentaries) / Clients: AIPCF; SFTFP - Paris, France. Writing, Directing, Producing two feature docs : On the Steps of Pichon-Riviere on an Argentian psychiatrist; The Divan doc on a quarterly review for clinicians.

May 2005 – May 2006 Film Director (Narrative & Documentary) / Clients: MAIN FILM - Montreal, Canada Writing, Directing, Producing a short narrative on Ronny & Cindy and a documentary on how individuals experience and manage their love lives, Ronny & Cindy in All of Us.


May 2005 – Nov. 2006 Newswriter - Reporter / Freelancing : La Grande Epoque, Montréal, Canada. Field reporting covering global, local and entertainment news with some focus on global issues, Human Rights, and the film Industry (covering film festivals and other events)


Feb. 2005 – May 2005. Newswriter - Reporter / Freelancing : CIBL 101.5 FM / 940 NEWS - Montreal, Canada. Newswriter and newscasting radio editions, field reporting covering the arts news and events of Montreal of 2min30 reports for the 6:00 to 9:00 AM daily program.


Sept. – December 2004 Newscast Producer / Short-Term Contract : French Jewish TV (Cable) – Paris, France. Newswriter and Newscast Producer voicing 1min30 stories for the only footage hourly news edition agencies footage.


Sept. 2004 – Dec 2004 Newscast Producer - Reporter / Freelancing : Ring Magazine - Paris, France.

Writing papers on the backstage and behind the doors news of the fourth power, medias: research, conducting interviews with TV channels and Film majors executives.


Season Sept. 2003 – July 2004 Screenwriter Production 22 - Paris, France. While returning from UCLA and creating the production company Eger Films, writing scripts for a sitcom.


Season Sept. 2002 – July 2003 Associate Producer : Skylight Productions - Paris, France. Designing the summary of the show, researching and casting witnesses and experts for stock new magazines shows and one-time variety or Reality TV shows.


Season Sept. 2001 – July 2002 Chief Editor & Executive Producer : Paloma Television - Paris, France Creating news magazines, selecting topics and stories, selecting the studio guests to invite, on-camera performers and crews to hire and manage, voicing stories.


Season Sept. 1999 – July 2000 Host & Executive Producer / Client : TLI - Clermont, France Creating a 52 minutes monthly news magazine, selecting topics, guests to invite, on-camera talents and crews to hire and manage, voicing some stories, hosting.


Season Sept. 1998- July 1999 Host-Producer / Client : Teleplaisance – Paris, France. Creating a 120 min. monthly news magazines, in full live selecting stories, voicing, hosting. Canalweb: Psychonet-TV, Rsf-TV: Newswriter/Reporter 2 to 6 min stories.

EDUCATION

2002 * Certificate in Professional Program in Producing (UCLA School of Theatre, Film & TV)

1993 – 1997 * Bachelor of Arts in Histoire University Paris I Panthéon-Sorbonne.

1986 – 1993 * High School Diploma Mathématiques & Philosophie (Lycée François Villon)

1982 – 1986 * Franco-American Elementary School -The School for Today (Paris 14eme).

story:
The American Dream is Alive.

When Quarks was first in its conception stages, it started at home. It was a fun dinner idea, a delightful little date night in which vegetables were chopped and meats were grilled and fun was had. It started in a kitchen, the same one where little ones scrambled for juice and Thanksgiving dinner has been cooked for years. Right on the very countertops that host late night sandwiches and home made deliciousness. 
And then it happened--a real building, a real kitchen, a real staff. A real restaurant. Quarks American Bento located at 125 5th Ave S St.Cloud MN.
In this day and age, people believe it's ridiculous to go into business. They scoff, and they talk about how difficult it is to start up. They say there's too much out there, it's all been done before. They say it's impossible to reach people, to get the masses excited about something new. Nothing is new, they'll say. The American Dream as we once knew it is dead, 
We beg to differ.
What does it take to keep the dream alive? Well, it takes a few things. It takes an idea to be proud of, one to hold on to when times get tough (because they will, they will always get tough.) It takes motivation to keep getting out of bed every morning and work tirelessly through the day, only to drop into bed and do it all again. It takes a team of hard working and loyal people--friends and family and strangers alike, to put all the blocks together until the empty building turns into something bigger, something grander. Most important, it takes a village. A strong community who sees their peers and wants to raise them up, to help them build themselves up and up and up until they can go no higher, and raises them higher still.
Where You Come In
Quarks American Bento has become more than any of the people here could have imagined. The exposed beams of the ceiling and brick of the walls, the gleaming wooden floors, the bright seats and exposed lights--they all feel like home now.  The staff that comes in daily, who chop and grill and serve--they're a family now. We're a family now. We take pride in one another and we take pride in our establishment, and we keep each other motivated and creative, and when you come in to our restaurant, it's no secret: We love what we do. And when you come in and come through our line, we want you to love what we do too. 
Your contribution is so much more than just monetary. Your contribution helps not only get a new, local eatery on its feet, but it helps keep a family together. It helps keep the shine in Quarks, that new fresh feeling of something good happening. It keeps our produce locally sourced, it keeps the pride alive. 
People keep saying the American Dream is dead, but we beg to differ thanks to you. The American dream is alive and well in a community who cares. You're not just a customer, not just a contributor. You're a guest, and when you leave, we hope you're our friend.
Every little bit helps in keeping Quarks American Bento up and running. Contributions are, of course, welcome, but if you can't, it would be just as beneficial (if not more so!) to spread our campaign around to as many people as we can. Or you can come visit us for lunch. Bring some friends, get some craft sodas (crafted right out of Cold Spring, MN) and enjoy some good music. 
Make Quarks yours, too. 
What the heck is Quarks?  Check out our social media presence on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest as well as follow our blog on our website to learn more in-depth of what and who we are and what we want to become, which simply is the new Chipotle of our day. Most who have been here that like Chipotle, simply love us. St. Cloud Times agrees, and voted us already, in the first three months, the number three fast food restaurant around, behind, the big chains.  We are on to something big here, we really are.
Quite simply, we are trying to do something that hasn't been done before.  Make really fresh, local, food, fast, completely customizable, free of preservatives, and junk that the big world around us has programmed us to eat over the past 4 generations, and make healthy food, that is real food, which can and is grown in our own back yard, taste really, really freaking good. Our bowls are low in calories, ranging from 400-600 calories, low in sodium, low in sugar, and can be depending on your sauce sugar free!  We are 100% gluten free!  We have taken the best of what Chipotle does, simplified it, made our food naturally fresher, naturally tastier, and naturally more nutritious for you to eat, at a competitive cost.  We think it is the best of the best, right here in St. Cloud MN, the only one of its kind.  We often say, if we can make it here in Stearns County, we can make it any where in the world. Prove us right.
Fill Your Bowl, Fill Your Soul

story:
Dear Networks, Investors, Producers an Fans

Who wants to be part of America's best kept secret? 
The Peter Austin Noto Show, a SAG-AFTRA production, is honored to have aired on NYC's public television station, Manhattan Neighborhood Network(MNN), 
which broadcasts to 600,000 -1,000,000 NYC residents; for the last 3 years but its time for primetime affiliation

The Peter Austin Noto Show is currently seeking to broadcast the entertaining visual experiences many have grown to love and enjoy by progressing the show to a Cable, 
National or Independent Network. Who wants to assist us?
Or... perhaps you're an investor hoping we will accept your money so that you can be part of this growing venture. Either way, as beggars we can't be choosers.

Contact The Peter Austin Noto Show by emailing your expectations and resume to tpanshow@gmail.com. We await your communication.

Please Support The Peter Austin Noto Show !!!

INDIEGOGO: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-peter-austin-noto-show--5/x/8502032#/story

ENJOY US BELOW:
Internet: http://www.peteraustinnoto.com/peter-austin-noto-show.html

IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2326995/?ref_=nm_flmg_act_2

Youtube: : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1ShpWevnP2SUmO2UIO433w

NEXT SHOW:
Sept 27 2015 at 2:30pm CH: 2
HOST ABIGAIL HAWK
ON THE PETER AUSTIN NOTO SHOW 
With Jennifer Nuccitelli an Peter Austin Noto

For More Information Please Visit
PeterAustinNoto.Com @
http://www.peteraustinnoto.com/
Thank You....


The money raised on INDIEGOGO for THE PETER AUSTIN NOTO SHOW

Will be used to help produce more shows with top talent to have the

Powers to be to invest in THE PETER AUSTIN NOTO SHOW and find

A Network where we can broadcast our material.

The Network can be a National Network like CBS, ABC or NBC,

A cable Network like MTV or Comedy Central, or Independent Network

Like Netflix or Hulu.

THE PETER AUSTIN NOTO SHOW is a hard working team but we need

your assistance to reach our goal.

GO   GO  GO . . . . PETER AUSTIN NOTO


Jaiden Kaine from Vampire Diaries has been on The Peter Austin Noto Show

Jaiden Kaine from Vampire Diaries has been on The Peter Austin Noto Show

Stretch goal of $10,000

The Peter Austin Noto Show is truly grateful to everyone who will assist us in reaching our goal of $10,000.

If we can meet our stretch goal of $10,000, 

we'll be able to have guest such as

Kate Winslet an

Scarlett Johansson



On The Peter Austin Noto Show which means more laughs, more fun and more nonsensical episodes on NETWORK TV

The Peter Austin Noto Show loves sharing its' success with its' followers because without you, we would not exist. That being said, we are offering an incentive to anyone who wants to assist with The Peter Austin Noto Show's Indiegogo fundraising campaign. 
Spread the word about our campaign to family, friends, coworkers, company, churches etc. and if you or your organization can assist us with raising money to reach our stretch goal of $10,000, you will receive a meeting with Peter an Jennifer at the The Peter Austin Noto Show. 
Here's how it works. Keep track of the donations your family, friends, coworker's, company or organization makes to The Peter Austin Noto Show's Indiegogo campaign.

Send an email to tpanshow@gmail.com with the names and donations of the individuals.

The Peter Austin Noto Show will tally up the donations and send you dates an time at studio for meeting
ABIGAIL HAWK FROM BLUE BLOODS has been on The Peter Austin Noto Show

ABIGAIL HAWK FROM BLUE BLOODS has been on The Peter Austin Noto Show

Our next goal is to take the show and find a Network where we can broadcast our material. The Network can be a National Network like CBS, ABC or NBC, a cable Network like MTV or Comedy Central, or Independent Network like Netflix or Hulu. 

Jennifer Nuccitelli, Al Sapienza an Peter Austin Noto has been on 

The Peter Austin Noto Show

Jennifer Nuccitelli, Al Sapienza an Peter Austin Noto has been on 

The Peter Austin Noto Show

We are at a Catch 22. In order for us to put our best foot forward when it comes to being ‘picked up’, guests which have a strong following…of whom people like to watch….are of our best interest.  On the flip side of that, these well known guests come at a price which is beyond the current parameters of the show’s budget.  We have had on the show Abigail Hawk from Blue Bloods TV star Al Sapienza and Jaiden Kaine from Vampire Diaries are just some of the talented individuals The Peter Austin Noto Show has had a guests

It just takes $ an my fingers are almost touching if you could see my fingers, were the show of shows, Scarlett Johansson wants to be on the show along with Lady GA GA, Robert Plant just to throw some names around


The Peter Austin Noto show achieved one of the goals we had set out to do….and that was receiving Union approval as a SAG/AFTRA production. 

Questions?  email The Peter Austin Noto Show at tpanshow@gmail.com

story:
Help us send a message to Hollywood that families want more family films!

Hollywood executives have told us that no one wants to see a 2 million dollar independent family film. WE THINK THEY'RE WRONG!

"Munchkins" is a musical movie with a brand new story based on the classic Frank L. Baum books.

With a wonderful twist - the Munchkins come to Hollywood!

Great original music, wonderful characters, and a sly sense of humor, "Munchkins" will be a classic Oz movie that you can be a part of! 

Support "Munchkins" and you'll be letting Hollywood know that there is a place and demand for independent family films!

And...we know what we're doing!

Writer/director Timothy Armstrong created the beloved family film - "Cowgirls 'N Angels" starring Oscar nominee James Cromwell and Bailee Madison


And we've put together some great perks to show our appreciation for your contribution!

We are grateful for your contribution! Thank You, Digital Wallpaper

Thank you, Digital Wallpaper, Mp3 of Munchkins Theme "Somewhere

Thank you, Digital Wallpaper, Complete Munchkins Soundtrack

Thank you, Digital Wallpaper, Munchkins Soundtrack, Digital Download of Movie

Thank you, Digital Wallpaper, Munchkins Soundtrack, Digital Download of Movie, Baseball Cap, Silver Slippers Charm

 Thank you, Digital Wallpaper, Munchkins Soundtrack, Digital Download of Movie,                               Baseball Cap, Silver Slippers Charm, Exclusive T-shirt                                (White t-shirt says "Size Doesn't Matter")

Thank you, Digital Wallpaper, Munchkins Soundtrack, Digital Download of Movie,  Baseball Cap, Silver Slippers Charm, Exclusive T-shirt, Munchkins Sunglasses just                like the ones worn by the Munchkins in the movie                              

Thank you, Digital Wallpaper, Munchkins Soundtrack, Digital Download of Movie,  Baseball Cap, Silver Slippers Charm, Exclusive T-shirt, Munchkins Sunglasses, Signed Munchkins Poster    

Thank you, Digital Wallpaper, Munchkins Soundtrack, Digital Download of Movie,  Baseball Cap, Silver Slippers Charm, Exclusive T-shirt, Munchkins Sunglasses, Signed Poster, DVD or Blu-ray  

Thank you, Digital Wallpaper, Munchkins Soundtrack, Digital Download of Movie,  Baseball Cap, Silver Slippers Charm, Exclusive T-shirt, Sunglasses, Signed Poster, DVD or Blu-ray, 2 Hour Online Group Class with Director Timothy Armstrong  

Thank you, Digital Wallpaper, Munchkins Soundtrack, Digital Download of Movie,  Baseball Cap, Silver Slippers Charm, Exclusive T-shirt, Sunglasses, Signed Poster, DVD or Blu-ray, 2 Hour Online Group Class with Director Timothy Armstrong, Exclusive to this campaign Munchkins Director's Chair with Your Name

All-expenses Paid Trip for 2 to the Movie Set for Three Nights, Dinner with Director and Stars, Executive Producer Credit in the Movie!

If we raise 2 million - a great movie

If we raise 3 million - even better!

What if we don't reach 2 million? 

We will take whatever we raise on Indiegogo and go out and and raise the remaining money through private investors. 

 

Questions and Guidelines:

  1. When will the movie be shot? We hope to film in spring, 2016.
  2. Who will star in Munchkins? We will offer the roles to the biggest stars possible. Often big stars have openings in their schedules and they will take  roles in independent films.  Also, Munchkins is an offbeat musical and actors are always looking for something new and different.
  3. Where will the movie be shot? We will shoot a few days in Hollywood, California and the rest of the shoot will be in New Orleans, Louisiana. Perks for coming to the set will be in New Orleans.
  4. How can we shoot a movie that is set in Hollywood in New Orleans? Canal Street in New Orleans looks a lot like Hollywood Blvd. We will also use footage of Hollywood to be cut throughout the movie. 
  5. But why go through all that trouble? Why not just shoot in Hollywood? Because if we shoot in New Orleans we will get the Louisiana Tax Incentive, which basically gives us $600,000 of free money!
  6. Where will the Munchkins premier be? It will be in Hollywood, California
  7. Hollywood Premier and Visits to the Movie Set perks do not include travel and accommodations.
  8. What happens if we don't raise all the money needed? We will use whatever money we raise on Indiegogo to partially fund the film. The rest of the money will come from private investors who we will approach after the campaign ends. 
  9. But what happens if the movie is never made? If the movie is never made the perks that can be fulfilled will be delivered. The balance will be refunded less the Indiegogo and paypal handling fees.

Can't donate? There are other ways you can help!

  • Please spread the word to co-workers, family and friends.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to send links to everyone you know.!
story_txt:
Help us send a message to Hollywood that families want more family films!

Hollywood executives have told us that no one wants to see a 2 million dollar independent family film. WE THINK THEY'RE WRONG!


"Munchkins" is a musical movie with a brand new story based on the classic Frank L. Baum books.




 With a wonderful twist - the Munchkins come to Hollywood!


   Great original music, wonderful characters, and a sly sense of humor, "Munchkins" will be a classic Oz movie that you can be a part of! 



Support "Munchkins" and you'll be letting Hollywood know that there is a place and demand for independent family films!



And...we know what we're doing!

Writer/director Timothy Armstrong created the beloved family film - "Cowgirls 'N Angels" starring Oscar nominee James Cromwell and Bailee Madison




And we've put together some great perks to show our appreciation for your contribution!


We are grateful for your contribution! Thank You, Digital Wallpaper

story:
What is Trilhando Caminho?

  Trilhando Caminho is a space that’s purpose is to empower girls of an impoverished community past the cyclical behaviors of drug abuse and domestic violence, instilling self-worth and confidence within them so that they can broaden their opportunities in a world that is constantly attempting to tell them they can’t because they are girls.

  The program recruits girls from Trilho, a favela, or slum, of Fortaleza to play soccer twice a week after school, instead of hanging on the street where they are susceptible to behaviors such as alcoholism, domestic abuse, and sexual tourism. This haven provides girls with the opportunity to choose a different, more positive, and empowering life path.

  For six weeks, the program focused strictly on soccer practice, demonstrating the logistics of the game. The focus has now begun to shift on the beauty of the game and how being strong provides a way to achieve goals. With a small push of financial help, Trilhando Caminho can flourish, and provide a path of empowerment to so many girls of the favela community of Trilho.

Why Should You Donate?

  The financial state of the community of Trilho does not allow room for funding a program such as Trilhando Caminho. If funding can be increased, further activities such as inspiring speakers and team outings can be implemented so as to increase the overall self-esteem, female empowerment, and educational development of the girls of Trilho.

  Trilhando Caminho is currently using one well-worn ball, and playing barefoot, as most of the girls do not have shoes that are suitable to play soccer in. While the team has determined a name Estrelas F.C. (Stars Football Club), uniforms must be put on hold, as there is no means to pay for them. There is huge potential for this project and an immense need for it to be implemented. By donating to this cause, you not only help the girls continue playing soccer and learning from speakers about ways to escape the cycle of poverty, you also will make a massive impact on the whole of the community. A portion of the funds donated will go to the community center, where access to water is little, and resources for night classes and meetings are very limited.

  Girls living in favelas, the slums of Brazil, face subjugation in their everyday lives believing they won’t amount to anything due to their living and financial constraints. By donating to this cause you are not only helping a group of girls play soccer, but you are assisting in the empowerment of a subjugated population of our world, young, impoverished women. In doing so, you can contribute to the betterment of each of these girls’ lives, offering them the joy of soccer and the idea that their state of being and living situation should not inhibit their dreams. Help the stars of Trilhando Caminho strive!

Who am I?

  While studying abroad in Fortaleza, I was given the opportunity to research the beginnings of Trilhando Caminho, and show how soccer can be beneficial to increasing female empowerment worldwide. Although I am no longer in Brazil, the program is still in my heart and still needs assistance. By creating a space to spread the word about the subjugation of these young women, and how soccer has been and continues to be so influential to them, I hope to pass on the message that we can make big change in this world with little bouts of aid.

  If you are unable to make a donation, please help get the word out. This is a small population in our big world, but this program can make a huge difference! 


If you are interested in hearing about the further successes of this group of girls, I will be sending out a newsletter, with updated pictures, biographies, and stories about the team's endeavors!

story:
CRYPTOMERIA

CRYPTOMERIA is an exploration into the subjectivity of perspective, a peregrination through multiple layers of consciousness using various film formats: Digital, 16mm, Super 8mm, and 8mm. 

Past Work 

CRYPTOMERIA consists largely of the same crew who made Nesting Doll. Rejoining the team is Sean Foster (Writer, Director), Sam Lowe-Anker (Key Animator), Adam Dahlen (Director of Photography), Katie Chapin (Producer), Stephanie Campbell (Actress), and Andreas Schroeder (Sound Design). Watch Nesting Doll below. 

Story

CRYPTOMERIA follows the introspection of a man haunted by self-hatred.  Its influences span from filmmakers like Maya Deren, Ernie Gehr and David Lynch to surrealist artists like Max Ernst, Rene Magritte and Salvador Dali. 

Risks & Challenges

We have three locations, one of which is a hotel room that we are physically building from the remnants of another set. It will be a challenge to make its aesthetic fit the mood of the film and find the proper materials to pragmatically configure this surreal world. 

The set is 10x14 feet and 8 feet tall, we are adding a door and a window and dressing it to look like a hotel room.

The theater we are hoping to film in is in Anaconda, MT. About and hour and a half away but well worth the drive. 

We are also exploring the medium of stop motion animation which will take lots of time and careful meticulous work. The costs are high as well as the consumption of time. However, the payout for proper execution is immense. 

A Note From Sam Lowe-Anker (Key Animator):

"We draw inspiration from Max Ernst's bird head drawings in "Une semaine de bonté", as well as  Ray Harryhausen's dinosaur and monster puppets in order to bring to life a truly convincing fictional character. Being constructed in the following images is a full human scale stop motion puppet of a man in a wheelchair with the head of a bird. The concept of creating a puppet of this size is one I feel pushes the boundaries of how 3D puppet animation has been executed by filmmakers in the past. Using life sized props in conjunction to the high level of detail permitted by molding techniques in conjunction with relative scale should achieve a disturbing level of realism in the finished piece".

Our main actor Zach Krell, as well as supporting actor Terry Nugent, live in different towns so we need funding to reimburse them for gas and any other expenses that result from driving.  

This film is going to be time intensive and is going to take a lot of dedicated hard work. Anything that you can give will help in the end, we greatly appreciate it!

story:
Perchè farlo? Perché chiedere soldi? Perché non trovare come al solito modi per farlo senza soldi?

Per chi non ha voglia di leggere, il video sopra spiega tutto.

Per chi non vuole o non può o preferisce non guardare il video, ve lo scrivo sinteticamente:

il canale esiste da un bel po' di tempo, ed è in continua evoluzione. Dieci anni fa eravamo tutti impazziti per i blog, oggi lo siamo con i canali Youtube. È una realtà. Come tutte le cose che richiedono esperienza, anche Quella Strana Parte di Youtube cresce un pelo di più ogni giorno. Un pelo un pelo alla fine fanno una foresta che va rasata.

COSA? No, aspettate, brutta metafora.
Cresce centimetro per centimetro, ok. Meglio. Come gli inizi sono nostalgicamente orribili nell'audio, gli approdi sono gradualmente sempre più meglio. Come? Non si può dire più meglio? Ah, ok. Sono sempre meglio più.
Una cosa che tuttavia non cresce sono le mie disponibilità economiche: nessuna differenza da quando ho iniziato il canale. Non ho ancora trovato un lavoro, ancora studio, ancora non sono riuscito a far andare nessuna attività. Il tempo che ho avuto libero l'ho dedicato praticamente soltanto al canale e a poco altro.

Sapete che siete ancora troppi pochi perché io possa ottenere qualche ricavo da Youtube. Lo faccio per passione, per stabilire un contatto con voi e per mio esercizio/voglia/necessità di comunitare.

Non solo una nuova serie di Barbons Friendly

Con l'occasione della nuova stagione di Barbons Friendly, volevo portare qualcosa di nuovo nel pieno spirito "On the Road" o anche "On the Run". Perché serve proprio una GoPro? Viene da chiedersi.
Perché alcune cose non possono essere fatte con le mani piene di una fotocamera. Perché ci sono alcune cose in cui nessuno può starvi dietro a riprendere e avete necessariamente bisogno di qualcosa di portatile e che registri in qualità.

Questa campagna quindi a cosa serve? Soltanto a una serie su un canale youtube? No, serve anche ad aiutare a crescere chi vi piace seguire e dargli gli strumenti per realizzare meglio le sue idee. O per realizzarle del tutto.

Difficile dirvi "OTTENETE MAGLIETTE FIRMATE E COTILLONS!" anche se mi piacerebbe un sacco.

Parliamo prima di cosa ottengo: la possibilità di fare cose per ora a me impossibili. Una prova che voi ci siete e che posso contare su di voi e posso tirare avanti a fare ciò che mi piace in qualche modo, arrabbattandomi come ho sempre fatto, ma con una spinta in più. 
Cosa ottengo? Il sentire che ci tenete.

Voi, cosa ottenete? Non so davvero cosa promettervi, quindi posso parlarvi di quello che io sento ad aiutare in qualcosa uno sconosciuto che guardo fare il deficiente su Youtube: mi sento vicino a lui, sento che lo sto aiutando e lo sto valorizzando. Gli sto dando la possibilità di avere un contatto fra me e lui e gli sto dando fiducia. Sarebbe pazzesco pensare di conoscervi uno per uno, ma il tempo è tanto, il canale sta qui, di certo non ci perdiamo di vista.
Inoltre, se per qualche assurdo motivo l'obiettivo arrivasse almeno a 600 dollari, potrei stamparvi almeno le magliette e/o gadgets da dare ai top contributor. Un po' alla Kickstarter, ma volando basso, nel reame del reale.

La domanda giusta è: perché 500$?

La prima risposta è: per la fotocamera ne bastano 400. Gli altri 100 sono per gli accessori + scheda SD e perché Indiegogo non fa mettere meno di 500 dollari.

Qualsiasi soldo in più non me lo tengo, ma bensì lo reinvesto in apparecchiature ed eventuali rewards. Non un solo centesimo se ne va fuori dal canale: tutto viene usato.

E se manco l'obiettivo? Non succede niente di apocalittico: non smetto di fare video, non mi deprimo, non vi incolpo, non mi sento un fallito. Questa campagna, questo tentativo, serve a spingere avanti una cosa, ma non deve finire per avere l'effetto contrario: anche ci fosse un euro qua sopra saprei che qualcuno di voi si è sentito di aiutarmi e questo basta.
Ovviamente ci sarebbe la delusione dell'impossibilità di realizzare quello che voglio e dovrei riorganizzarmi. Ma la vita è fatta di prove, non superarle fa parte del rischio.

Una campagna di raccolta fondi? Non ho mai sognato nemmeno di farla. Questo tentativo è un sogno, un buttare là le basi, un po' come quell'account Patreon che non ho mai aperto al pubblico. Ho sempre avuto bisogno di soldi per fare quello che voglio fare, come tutti ed ho la sfortuna/incapacità di non avere ancora un lavoro. Tutti noi sognamo di poter avere la sicurezza di materializzare le idee ed averne un ritorno, ma in questo caso lo sto facendo perché un po' vi metto alla prova, un po' mi metto alla prova.

Se riesce è ovvio chiamo La Vita in Diretta per farmi intervistare che ho fatto i big money e mi trombo Giletti per essere campato da lui.
Mi pare logico.

Rischio di perdere la vostra fiducia.

Rischio di far pensare a qualcuno che questa sia la mossa disperata di qualcuno che ha bisogno di soldi, vuole soddisfare un capriccio e non vuole lavorare.

In sostanza sì, rischio un po' di buttare via tutto quello che ho fatto finora.

Non significa che improvvisamente penso di perdere tutti gli iscritti o di non poter più andare per strada. Dico solo che voglio che tutto sia onesto, chiaro e trasparente. Se lo sto facendo è già un grande segnale: io mi fido di chi siete, di dove siete e ho bisogno del vostro supporto. Ho sempre voluto avere una squadra intorno che lavorasse insieme per creare qualcosa, ed il canale l'avete un po' plasmato anche voi con quello che dicevate e volevate. Potete esserne parte anche così?

Non tutti potranno dare soldi è normale, io stesso posso di solito dare 1 o 2 euro quando davvero lo voglio. Cosa potete fare allora?

Fare tanta pubblicità alla campagna, il più possibile, chiamare chi può dare qualcosa e vedere se vengono coinvolti dalla passione che ci sto mettendo. Non nascondo che è un po' un casello di controllo: se veramente riesco, so di poter fare di più e lo faccio. Io vivo di passione, vedere che voi apprezzate cose che faccio io è una soddisfazione immensa, figuratevi vedere cose del tutto superflue, come raggiungere obiettivi su un sito di crowdfunding, cosa può scatenare nella mia testa malata.
Anche fanart, fanfic, foto, articoli, non so, veramente QUALSIASI cosa vi venga in mente di poter fare, fatela senza pensarci due volte e mi state già aiutando, anche se falliamo l'obiettivo: ci siete stati.


Update: 115$ dollari a 37 ore dalla scadenza. Ragazzi. Io ci credo, e vi ringrazio già da ora.
story_txt:
Perchè farlo? Perché chiedere soldi? Perché non trovare come al solito modi per farlo senza soldi?
Per chi non ha voglia di leggere, il video sopra spiega tutto.
Per chi non vuole o non può o preferisce non guardare il video, ve lo scrivo sinteticamente:
il canale esiste da un bel po' di tempo, ed è in continua evoluzione. Dieci anni fa eravamo tutti impazziti per i blog, oggi lo siamo con i canali Youtube. È una realtà. Come tutte le cose che richiedono esperienza, anche Quella Strana Parte di Youtube cresce un pelo di più ogni giorno. Un pelo un pelo alla fine fanno una foresta che va rasata.
COSA? No, aspettate, brutta metafora.Cresce centimetro per centimetro, ok. Meglio. Come gli inizi sono nostalgicamente orribili nell'audio, gli approdi sono gradualmente sempre più meglio. Come? Non si può dire più meglio? Ah, ok. Sono sempre meglio più.Una cosa che tuttavia non cresce sono le mie disponibilità economiche: nessuna differenza da quando ho iniziato il canale. Non ho ancora trovato un lavoro, ancora studio, ancora non sono riuscito a far andare nessuna attività. Il tempo che ho avuto libero l'ho dedicato praticamente soltanto al canale e a poco altro.
Sapete che siete ancora troppi pochi perché io possa ottenere qualche ricavo da Youtube. Lo faccio per passione, per stabilire un contatto con voi e per mio esercizio/voglia/necessità di comunitare.
Non solo una nuova serie di Barbons Friendly
Con l'occasione della nuova stagione di Barbons Friendly, volevo portare qualcosa di nuovo nel pieno spirito "On the Road" o anche "On the Run". Perché serve proprio una GoPro? Viene da chiedersi.Perché alcune cose non possono essere fatte con le mani piene di una fotocamera. Perché ci sono alcune cose in cui nessuno può starvi dietro a riprendere e avete necessariamente bisogno di qualcosa di portatile e che registri in qualità.
Questa campagna quindi a cosa serve? Soltanto a una serie su un canale youtube? No, serve anche ad aiutare a crescere chi vi piace seguire e dargli gli strumenti per realizzare meglio le sue idee. O per realizzarle del tutto.

Difficile dirvi "OTTENETE MAGLIETTE FIRMATE E COTILLONS!" anche se mi piacerebbe un sacco.Parliamo prima di cosa ottengo: la possibilità di fare cose per ora a me impossibili. Una prova che voi ci siete e che posso contare su di voi e posso tirare avanti a fare ciò che mi piace in qualche modo, arrabbattandomi come ho sempre fatto, ma con una spinta in più. Cosa ottengo? Il sentire che ci tenete.
Voi, cosa ottenete? Non so davvero cosa promettervi, quindi posso parlarvi di quello che io sento ad aiutare in qualcosa uno sconosciuto che guardo fare il deficiente su Youtube: mi sento vicino a lui, sento che lo sto aiutando e lo sto valorizzando. Gli sto dando la possibilità di avere un contatto fra me e lui e gli sto dando fiducia. Sarebbe pazzesco pensare di conoscervi uno per uno, ma il tempo è tanto, il canale sta qui, di certo non ci perdiamo di vista.Inoltre, se per qualche assurdo motivo l'obiettivo arrivasse almeno a 600 dollari, potrei stamparvi almeno le magliette e/o gadgets da dare ai top contributor. Un po' alla Kickstarter, ma volando basso, nel reame del reale.


La domanda giusta è: perché 500$?
La prima risposta è: per la fotocamera ne bastano 400. Gli altri 100 sono per gli accessori + scheda SD e perché Indiegogo non fa mettere meno di 500 dollari.
Qualsiasi soldo in più non me lo tengo, ma bensì lo reinvesto in apparecchiature ed eventuali rewards. Non un solo centesimo se ne va fuori dal canale: tutto viene usato.
E se manco l'obiettivo? Non succede niente di apocalittico: non smetto di fare video, non mi deprimo, non vi incolpo, non mi sento un fallito. Questa campagna, questo tentativo, serve a spingere avanti una cosa, ma non deve finire per avere l'effetto contrario: anche ci fosse un euro qua sopra saprei che qualcuno di voi si è sentito di aiutarmi e questo basta.Ovviamente ci sarebbe la delusione dell'impossibilità di realizzare quello che voglio e dovrei riorganizzarmi. Ma la vita è fatta di prove, non superarle fa parte del rischio.

Una campagna di raccolta fondi? Non ho mai sognato nemmeno di farla. Questo tentativo è un sogno, un buttare là le basi, un po' come quell'account Patreon che non ho mai aperto al pubblico. Ho sempre avuto bisogno di soldi per fare quello che voglio fare, come tutti ed ho la sfortuna/incapacità di non avere ancora un lavoro. Tutti noi sognamo di poter avere la sicurezza di materializzare le idee ed averne un ritorno, ma in questo caso lo sto facendo perché un po' vi metto alla prova, un po' mi metto alla prova.
Se riesce è ovvio chiamo La Vita in Diretta per farmi intervistare che ho fatto i big money e mi trombo Giletti per essere campato da lui.Mi pare logico.

Rischio di perdere la vostra fiducia.
Rischio di far pensare a qualcuno che questa sia la mossa disperata di qualcuno che ha bisogno di soldi, vuole soddisfare un capriccio e non vuole lavorare.

    In sostanza sì, rischio un po' di buttare via tutto quello che ho fatto finora.
Non significa che improvvisamente penso di perdere tutti gli iscritti o di non poter più andare per strada. Dico solo che voglio che tutto sia onesto, chiaro e trasparente. Se lo sto facendo è già un grande segnale: io mi fido di chi siete, di dove siete e ho bisogno del vostro supporto. Ho sempre voluto avere una squadra intorno che lavorasse insieme per creare qualcosa, ed il canale l'avete un po' plasmato anche voi con quello che dicevate e volevate. Potete esserne parte anche così?Non tutti potranno dare soldi è normale, io stesso posso di solito dare 1 o 2 euro quando davvero lo voglio. Cosa potete fare allora?
Fare tanta pubblicità alla campagna, il più possibile, chiamare chi può dare qualcosa e vedere se vengono coinvolti dalla passione che ci sto mettendo. Non nascondo che è un po' un casello di controllo: se veramente riesco, so di poter fare di più e lo faccio. Io vivo di passione, vedere che voi apprezzate cose che faccio io è una soddisfazione immensa, figuratevi vedere cose del tutto superflue, come raggiungere obiettivi su un sito di crowdfunding, cosa può scatenare nella mia testa malata.Anche fanart, fanfic, foto, articoli, non so, veramente QUALSIASI cosa vi venga in mente di poter fare, fatela senza pensarci due volte e mi state già aiutando, anche se falliamo l'obiettivo: ci siete stati.Update: 115$ dollari a 37 ore dalla scadenza. Ragazzi. Io ci credo, e vi ringrazio già da ora.

story:
The Story?

Lawrence, a new age relationship expert, helps his clients deal with relationship woes in a not so formal process. He conducts dream therapy by inducing his clients under a dream-like state. He reveals their self-conscious to them, and also reveals their spouse self-conscious, in order for them to find the truth about their lover. However, things come to a halt when Lawrence meets Dr. Lindin; a blind, set in her own formal ways, Psychologist with a focus in marriage counseling. With the two bumping into each other, an argument is sure to follow, with the opposite teachings from each side. Dr. Lindin agrees to a scheduled session with Lawrence, and finds out there is another method than what she is use to. Taking a live trip inside her own self-conscious brings an eye opening experience, but chaos surely follows when her husband self-conscious is probed. Dr. Lindin not only finds out who her husband really is, but also finds herself in hot water when she is trapped inside of his mind. A game of fantasy and real life is played to see if she can awake from her comatose state. Will Lawrence be able to go in and save her from this unfortunate chain of events, or lose his own mind in the process?


Where do I hail from?

I'm from Chicago, IL, attended school at Columbia College of Chicago. I have been writing for several years. I first wrote a relationship book entitled "Love Or Lust"; how to find, acquire, and keep love. Soon after I wrote my first feature length screenplay. I placed in the top ten in a writer's lab at the Phoenix Film Festival. It was then I knew I had the ability to write. So 7 screenplays later here I land in Austin, TX.

So why am  asking for your money?

That is the most important question by far, why should you help me out? Well I think I have a couple good reasons why.

  1. Lack of funds can make for a horrendous movie.

Listen I get it, I know you can do a movie with no money, I can attest to that myself. But the truth of the matter is without being able to pay your workers, and not afford quality equipment, makes for a hectic shooting schedule. I found myself wearing 8 hat; workers wouldn't work as hard for no pay,  and sometimes I couldn't feed the cast & crew. Let's talk about equipment, lack of cameras to capture the perfect angles, constant breakdown and setups to capture a single movement. By the end of the movie we had made so many mistakes that the story suffered tremendously. Money does make a difference: and with my type of work, I could seriously use it. I write nothing but full length movies, and with that I generate a large crew. So in order for my vision to manifest properly, I need support from the great people of the world.

   2.  Dreams sometime need the world's hope to fly.

Let me give you a little honest background from where I come from and my stance in this world. I'm not your everyday filmmaker out to make a quick buck or hustle the people. My, hopes, dreams, and lively hood is counting on this. I came from the urban neighborhoods of Chicago & Gary, Indiana. My mother and father raised six children on low middle class income and never asked for a thing. I would always dream that one day I'm going to make it and give them the life they deserve. So I would watch TV shows and dream; use cartoons to escape my harsh surroundings. And one day I thought I would get my chance to blossom and show the world that I was meant to be somebody. If I had money for my own equipment I could surely produce quality that would pave my way: but I only have the scripts, the vision, the talent. I need someone to supply that much needed help so I can get that chance to compete in this world of film. I thought that would have came with my first feature length movie "The Godchildren". But with no money at all and a lack of dedicated crew members, the movie did not come out like I expected. I learned that in order to really do this on  a big scale, I'm going to need big money. So I just launched 2 campaigns for my scripts to see if my dreams can take flight. But it can't happen if you don't give me a chance.

This is not our first time around!

You're not taking a chance on giving your money to some first-timers. We've been there before where we had to learn from our stumbles. We know how to take a hit and keep going. We have worked on countless projects that our shelved for the very same reason, no money to do it the right way. I guarantee you I will produce a film worth while, if you back this vision.

Conclusion!

So where do we go down this LoneRoad? Here and now, you and I lie in this gateway. In my hands I posses hope, belief, a dream. And in your hands lies a map, a match, a key. I'm asking you to light the flame and open the door. And in return I will release a set of scripts that will bring raw untapped creativity to the film industry. And maybe, just maybe, we can walk this LoneRoad together. Until then!

story:
Short Summary

Have you ever wanted to be a part of a college hockey program? Well here is your chance. The University of Idaho Ice Hockey program is fundraising for the 2015-2016 season and we need your help.

The University of Idaho Hockey team is a part of the American Collegiate Hockey Association (ACHA) and is also a part of the Division II Independent Conference, soon making the jump to the Mountain West Collegiate Hockey League. The team was established in 1992 and is one of the oldest sports clubs at the University of Idaho. 

Since we are not recognized as a Varsity sport by the University of Idaho we do not receive very much funding from the school. The primary source of income for the team is from the players themselves, but sometimes it still is not enough to afford playing in a competitive league so here is your chance to get involved and become a Vandal Hockey supporter.

 If you would like to help push the Vandals to the playoffs and beyond, please help us reach our goal. We have some great incentives for everyone who decides to help. Thank you, and as always Go Vandals!

Sincerely,

-The Vandal Ice Hockey Family


What We Need & What You Get

Each year, the University of Idaho Hockey program budgets just under $35,000 to afford a successful season playing in the ACHA. That money covers program costs such as:

  • Travel/hotel/gas/food/etc.
  • Ice rentals (both practice & games)
  • Referee fees
  • ACHA league fees
  • USA Hockey Insurance fees
  • Gear
  • Equipment 
  • Staff
  • And much more.

But where does the $35,000 come from? As a start, we receive $10,000 from the University of Idaho to cover our basic costs, but that is just a dent. After that, each player pays $600 on top of tuition to participate in the University of Idaho Hockey program. With a 20 man roster, we've reached another $12,000 for our team totaling $22,000. The remaining $13,000 is left for the our program to fund raise over the course of the season which is where this site comes in.

Our fundraising goal is $5,000 dollars for the team to help off-set the costs of the University of Idaho Hockey program. 

If you look to the right you will see the great incentives we are offering you. If you don't see a dollar amount on there that you like you can always write in any dollar amount from $1 and higher. All perks above $50 include free tickets to all Vandal Hockey home games in Moscow, ID.

Over the course of the last four seasons, the University of Idaho Hockey program has teamed up with the Boise State Hockey Club and has helped raised just under $80,000 for the Meals on Wheels organization in Boise, ID. Along with that, the Vandal Hockey Family has helped raise just under $5,000 dollars for the Wildland Firefighting Foundation in central Idaho in the past three seasons. By donating to the University of Idaho Hockey program, you are now helping us help these organizations in need.

The Impact

With every donation to the Vandal Hockey program, the program will grow stronger as a whole. Your donation will give us the opportunity to play new teams, recruit new players, and continue to represent the University of Idaho legacy on and off the ice.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand if money is tight and you are unable to donate. There are other ways you can help the program!

  • If you could help spread the word about our fundraising goal on Facebook, Twitter, or other forms of social media, we would greatly appreciate that.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Share and like our Facebook Page, https://www.facebook.com/IdahoVandalHockey
  • If you're having trouble donating, check your browser. Indie Go-Go does not support Exploror 8.0 or lower. 
  • Come check our our games and get loud!

story:
Key Features

  • Massive Multiplayer - a world full with danger and other players! 
  • Unique Gameplay - After you bought your first ship in Onima, it's all about gathering more resources to upgrade to or buy a much stronger ship. You can accomplish that in different ways. Battle other players, collect cargo and debris from there destroyed ship's. Or maybe some relaxing mining will help you get to your goal faster? 
  • Cool Spaceship Management - Entirely control your ship systems! This will help you to win battles with stronger players, lower or power up your shields, use you're cloak, charge your warp drive, repair you're damaged hull, scan sectors to detect other players, control ship's power supply and more! 
  • Plan Your Moves - In Onima stuff changes quickly! One wrong warp and you find you're self in a middle of a giant battle between 2 powerful factions. One wrong word and you can start a giant battle between 2 powerful factions! 
  • Missions - Onima also offers you an interesting plot. With missions you can find out more about Onima and its history. Doing missions will help you level up, which will get you bigger, stronger ships much faster 





  Hello, my name is Sam. I'm one of the creators of Onima. Me and my friends started working on the game in mid 2014. We thought that this idea is super awesome! We really wanted to play a game like Onima for a while. So we decided to create it ourselves.
  We are a small team working from Almaty, Kazakhstan. And it is really hard with game-dev in our country. So that's why we need professional help. If we reach our goal of 10 000$ we will invite some great professionals, who will help us finish this EPIC game!




We will keep it clear and transparent!


We will invite some professional guys from Russia, they will help us with preparing the DEMO version of the game. Now, those guys need a place to stay and we will have to pay for that.
 They cant work in our homes because there wont be enough of room for 8 of us,
that's why we will need to rent a small office(325$ per month) and buy some basic furniture.
 Now to release anything at all we will require license unity 3D ownership. That is a must have for us.  

Now we do understand that you are not entirely sure about all of this. But we can assure you that your money wont go to waste! We will sit day and night working on the game so that we could present it to you as soon as possible.
 We are hiring some really good people. People who really know what they are doing. People who think that Onima is a great game and will do anything to finish it.
 

Here are some risks:

1) We are creating a Massive Multiplayer game, and that means that there will be a lot of problems with the game in the very beginning. Its not an easy thing to create a game this caliber. And  that means a lot of work for our people. The more you donate, the more experts we can invite to join us. And that means the faster we will get the game done.

2) We are not sure how many of you will want to get a 3D-printed statue or a T-Shirt  so we wont guarantee that you will receive it on time, but what we do guarantee is that you will receive it! 

3) We cant be sure if we finish the game on time. But we will do our level best to do so. Creating a game is a hard process that requires a lot of time.  We really want this game to become a reality so we will work 24/7 on it.


3$ Perk

 Well most of the campaigns offer just a "Thanks" for 5 or less dollars.
We are not the most! Our game will cost you 3.33$! And that means 
that you will get 1 copy of the game if you back-up us now!

10$  Perk

 For 10$ you will get 1 copy of the game, 1 copy of the demo version. 
Yeah... that's not much... And that's why you get 1 copy of the alpha version game on Steam(if we manage to get to Steam xD)!!!

15$  Perk

 15$, huh? You really like the game don't you? Well we really appreciate it! And for 
15$ we will add you're name in to the game. It could be a name of an NPC, a name a 
ship, who knows? Maybe you will become the main hero in our plot! And 1 copy of the game on Steam. And 1 copy of the demo version!

20$ Perk

 Well man, you are just like... DA BEST! We love you really, we do! For 20$ we will gift you a unique T-Shirt with one of the many in-game space-ships! 1 copy of the demo version, 1 copy of the alpha version and 1 copy of the beta version... aaaand 1 
copy of the complete game!

30$ Perk

 30$... Big fan, huh? So that's how much you love the game?
Well then this is how much we love you: 1 super rare 3d-printed spaceship from the game! "Volcano" the rarest ship in the galaxy, and you will have it 3D printed!!!!! + 1 copy of every version!

45$ Perk

 You get 1 3D statue of the "Volcano", 2 T-Shits with Onima spaceships on them, 2 demo versions of the game, 2 alpha versions of the game, 2 beta versions and 1 complete game!



For the Creators!

Well, Creator... for you we are giving way a trip to Almaty, Kazakhstan! The most beautiful city in all of the Middle Asia. A week in one of the best hotels in Almaty the 

Rixos Hotel. A tour around Almaty from us the developers. A visit to our HQ.
 Mad Catz® S.T.R.I.K.E.™ 7 Gaming Keyboard for PC, Mad Catz R.A.T 9 Gaming Mouse, G.L.I.D.E.9 Aluminum Gaming Surface and 10 copies of every version of the game!

You will receive the trip invitation and the gaming gear in July 2016

You will get 5% of the income from the Onima sales. You will become one of the Co-founders of BOBBI Games. You will own a 5% of BOBBI Games!


Almaty is the biggest city in Kazakhstan!

In one of the best hotels in Almaty!

Battle other players, collect cargo and debris from there destroyed ship's. Or maybe some relaxing mining will help you get to your goal faster? 


Cool Spaceship Management - Entirely control your ship systems! This will help you to win battles with stronger players, lower or power up your shields, use you're cloak, charge your warp drive, repair you're damaged hull, scan sectors to detect other players, control ship's power supply and more! 


Plan Your Moves - In Onima stuff changes quickly! One wrong warp and you find you're self in a middle of a giant battle between 2 powerful factions. One wrong word and you can start a giant battle between 2 powerful factions! 


Missions - Onima also offers you an interesting plot. With missions you can find out more about Onima and its history. Doing missions will help you level up, which will get you bigger, stronger ships much faster 










  Hello, my name is Sam. I'm one of the creators of Onima. Me and my friends started working on the game in mid 2014. We thought that this idea is super awesome! We really wanted to play a game like Onima for a while. So we decided to create it ourselves.  We are a small team working from Almaty, Kazakhstan. And it is really hard with game-dev in our country. So that's why we need professional help. If we reach our goal of 10 000$ we will invite some great professionals, who will help us finish this EPIC game!











We will keep it clear and transparent!

 We will invite some professional guys from Russia, they will help us with preparing the DEMO version of the game. Now, those guys need a place to stay and we will have to pay for that. They cant work in our homes because there wont be enough of room for 8 of us,that's why we will need to rent a small office(325$ per month) and buy some basic furniture. Now to release anything at all we will require license unity 3D ownership. That is a must have for us.  Now we do understand that you are not entirely sure about all of this. But we can assure you that your money wont go to waste! We will sit day and night working on the game so that we could present it to you as soon as possible. We are hiring some really good people. People who really know what they are doing. People who think that Onima is a great game and will do anything to finish it. 
Here are some risks:1) We are creating a Massive Multiplayer game, and that means that there will be a lot of problems with the game in the very beginning. Its not an easy thing to create a game this caliber. And  that means a lot of work for our people. The more you donate, the more experts we can invite to join us. And that means the faster we will get the game done.
2) We are not sure how many of you will want to get a 3D-printed statue or a T-Shirt  so we wont guarantee that you will receive it on time, but what we do guarantee is that you will receive it! 
3) We cant be sure if we finish the game on time. But we will do our level best to do so. Creating a game is a hard process that requires a lot of time.  We really want this game to become a reality so we will work 24/7 on it.



3$ Perk
 Well most of the campaigns offer just a "Thanks" for 5 or less dollars.We are not the most! Our game will cost you 3.33$! And that means that you will get 1 copy of the game if you back-up us now!
10$  Perk

 For 10$ you will get 1 copy of the game, 1 copy of the demo version. Yeah... that's not much... And that's why you get 1 copy of the alpha version game on Steam(if we manage to get to Steam xD)!!!
15$  Perk

 15$, huh? You really like the game don't you? Well we really appreciate it! And for 15$ we will add you're name in to the game. It could be a name of an NPC, a name a ship, who knows? Maybe you will become the main hero in our plot! And 1 copy of the game on Steam. And 1 copy of the demo version!
20$ Perk
 Well man, you are just like... DA BEST! We love you really, we do! For 20$ we will gift you a unique T-Shirt with one of the many in-game space-ships! 1 copy of the demo version, 1 copy of the alpha version and 1 copy of the beta version... aaaand 1 copy of the complete game!
30$ Perk
 30$... Big fan, huh? So that's how much you love the game?Well then this is how much we love you: 1 super rare 3d-printed spaceship from the game! "Volcano" the rarest ship in the galaxy, and you will have it 3D printed!!!!! + 1 copy of every version!
45$ Perk
 You get 1 3D statue of the "Volcano", 2 T-Shits with Onima spaceships on them, 2 demo versions of the game, 2 alpha versions of the game, 2 beta versions and 1 complete game!


For the Creators!

Well, Creator... for you we are giving way a trip to Almaty, Kazakhstan! The most beautiful city in all of the Middle Asia. A week in one of the best hotels in Almaty the 
Rixos Hotel. A tour around Almaty from us the developers. A visit to our HQ.  Mad Catz® S.T.R.I.K.E.™ 7 Gaming Keyboard for PC, Mad Catz R.A.T 9 Gaming Mouse, G.L.I.D.E.9 Aluminum Gaming Surface and 10 copies of every version of the game!
You will receive the trip invitation and the gaming gear in July 2016
You will get 5% of the income from the Onima sales. You will become one of the Co-founders of BOBBI Games. You will own a 5% of BOBBI Games!



Almaty is the biggest city in Kazakhstan!
In one of the best hotels in Almaty!

story:
Bref Résumé

Bonjour et  bienvenue sur ma campagne Indiegogo! Je m’appelle Francis Groulx et je suis un étudiant en communication-marketing à l’Université de Sherbrooke. Pour projet de stage, j’ai comme objectif de parcourir le Canada au complet. Mon but : réaliser une émission qui sera diffusé sur le Web Télé, pour chacune des provinces visitée incluant la participation des diverses  associations francophones dans l’optique d’inciter les francophones à découvrir notre beau pays.

Pourquoi:

Ce projet me tiens vraiment à cœur puisque je désire faire partie de votre quotidien dans le futur en tant qu’animateur Télé. En réalisant une expérience de la sorte, j’enrichie non seulement ma culture personnelle mais, je profite d’une occasion unique pour me faire connaître auprès du public francophone.

C’est QUOI! Le projet Parcours Franco-Canada:

C’est toute une belle aventure à partager qui débute avec un départ le 24 mai 2015 et le retour est prévu pour le 24 août 2015. Pendant c’est 3 mois, ma caméraman et moi allons parcourir 15 milles km sur 5 fuseaux horaires différents, dans un seul but! - Découvrir les différentes associations de la francophonie au Canada. À l’aide des images capturées, vous témoignerez de mon expédition qui vous donnera à votre tour l’envie de partir à la découverte du Canada peut-être?

Ce dont nous avons besoin et ce que vous obtenez

L’objectif de 6 500$ servira à défrayer tous les frais engendrés lors du voyage (transport, essence, hébergement pour 2 personnes, etc.) Évidemment, il s’agit d’un petit montant pour 3 mois, mais c’est ce qui me manque afin de compléter mon projet.

Grâce à l’aide de généreux contributeurs comme vous, le contenu du travail dont je réalise va être considérablement augmenté. Avec votre aide, je vais pouvoir présenté plusieurs aspects propres à chaque province alliant découvertes locales, activités de plein air, travail local, contenus historique, les attractions plus ou moins touristiques parfois méconnues du grand public et qui gagne à être connu.

Pour chaque sommes versée, je m’engage à vous témoigner personnellement de ma reconnaissance pour votre soutient. Selon le montant du don, vous recevrez en échange différents items promotionnels, je vous invite à consulter la liste des incitatifs.

Soyez assurez que l’argent amasser sera entièrement consacré au Parcours Franco-Canada. La distance parcourue sera en conséquence de l’argent recueillie voilà pourquoi votre implication est nécessaire pour porter à terme ce projet!

L’impact :

Il est important de souligner  le travail effectué par les associations de la francophonie afin de promouvoir la langue française. La langue française fait partie de l’héritage canadien et mérite qu’on la préserve. Je vous offre l’occasion de vous joindre à mon périple avec cette campagne Indiegogo. En faisant un don pour ce projet, vous témoignerez de mes premiers pas dans une carrière future remplie de nouveaux défis. Je compte sur vous!

Ce projet est le plus grand et le plus ambitieux de tous et je compte bien arriver à mes fins! Ce n’est pas mon premier projet d’animation à la TV. Par le passé, j’ai animé des capsules de sport à la TV communautaire, et complété un DEC en cinéma. En plus de réaliser mon court-métrage en fin de DEC j’ai réalisé plusieurs projets vidéo.

Une page Facebook officielle au nom de Parcours Franco-Canada sera créée afin que le public  francophone puisse me suivre à l’aide des réseaux sociaux. De plus, un site web sera lancé sur lequel vous pourrez vous informer sur les endroits que j’aurais visités, sur les associations de la francophonie au Canada, les attractions à ne pas manquer, les restaurants, les divers place d’hébergement, une galerie photos et vidéos, etc.

Bref, j’aimerais que le site web et la page Facebook de Parcours Franco-Canada deviennent des outils de références pour toutes personnes désirant voyager à travers le Canada.

Risques et défis

Évidemment ce projet nécessite une grande planification et organisation. Nous allons faire face à des délais serrés, un horaire chargé, un nombre d’heure de tournage important.

La route en soit peut comporter sa part de risque, toutefois nous allons faire preuve d’une grande prudence! Le plus grand défi selon moi va être de réussir à trancher sur le contenu à tourner pour les émissions, car une moyenne d’une semaine par province pour faire le tour c’est vraiment rapide !

D'autres façons d'aider

Évidemment la participation monétaire est toujours appréciée, cependant le simple fait de partager ma campagne Indiegogo auprès de vos contacts signifie déjà beaucoup pour moi et m’aiderait assurément à atteindre mon objectif. Je vous invite donc à prendre quelques minutes de votre temps et d’utiliser les outils de partage Indiegogo!

Merci de votre intention et en espérant vous retrouvez nombreux devant vos écrans ;)!

story:
Sarah S. from New Jersey bought a car for around $1,200 and recently, it became inoperable. 

She says the head of the car is cracked and it'd cost too much to get it fixed so it's getting junked. She is now without a car. She's been saving up money for a trip to South Korea but now that plan is going down the drain.
Let's all chip in and help a fellow human and help her reach her dreams! Starting with a brand new car.
I do understand $25,000 is a lot but at least it'll get her a better car than what she had and that's what she needs. 
Donate what you can! Every penny helps! Tell your friends! Tell your families! Help this girl!

story:
English                Español


¡300 Likes on Facebook!

and counting...


You have the opportunity to be part of this shortfilm.

Tienes la oportunidad de ser parte de este cortometraje.

LUCIANA


Luciana is an animated short film that brings together aspects from
magic, terror and imagination.

Luciana es un cortometraje de animación que reúne aspectos de
magia, terror e imaginación.

Today, Luciana needs you. But first, I want you to know a bit more of
what it's all about.

Hoy, Luciana te necesita. Pero primero, quiero que sepas un poco más de
lo que se trata todo esto.


Through imagination, Luciana will take us back to our childhood. She
becomes blind after an accident and must confront her fear of
darkness, a fear we surely had as children.

But will Luciana conquer her fears through her other senses?


A través de la imaginación, Luciana nos llevará de nuevo a nuestra infancia. Ella
queda ciega luego de un accidente y tiene que enfrentarse a su mas grande miedo, ¡La oscuridad, un miedo que seguro tuvimos cuando niños.

¿Pero será que Luciana podrá afrontar sus miedos a través de sus otros sentidos?



What you see in the video is a prototype of the process until today,
but in order to complete the short film we must reach our budget.
That’s why we want you to join our team!

Lo que se ve en el video es un prototipo del proceso hasta hoy,
pero a fin de completar el cortometraje debemos llegar a nuestro presupuesto.
Es por eso que queremos que se unan a nuestro equipo!


We have different perks for thank you for your support.

Tenemos diferentes recompensas para darte las gracias por tu apoyo.


Every dollar you donate will bring this idea into reality.
If you definetly can’t make a donation, you can share this campaign with
possible donators that would want to join us.

Cada dólar que donas acercará esta idea en una realidad.
Si definitivamente no puedes realizar un aporte con una donación, puedes compartir esta campaña con posibles donantes que quieren unirse a nosotros.


I will leave you with a list of some of the things in which we will
use your donation.

Los dejo con una lista de algunas de las cosas en las que vamos a
utilizar su donación.

Buy materials to make the characters.
Comprar materiales para realizar los personajes

Acquire legal software to carry out the short film. (Dragonframe)
Adquirir el software legal para realizar el cortometraje. (Dragonframe)

Pay the animators that will help the director give life to Luciana.
Pagar a los animadores que junto al Director daran vida a Luciana.

Hire the musicians who will compose the entire soundtrack.
Pagar la composición y el diseño sonoro



Any contribution you can give will be a big step for this idea
become a reality.

Cualquier contribución que puedas diar, será un gran paso para que esta idea
se convierta en una realidad.


If you want to follow the process of the movie, you can do it here...

Si quieres seguir el proceso de la película, puede hacerlo aquí ...

Luciana Progress


Thank you! We can do it!.


Some images of the creative process Luciana...

Algunas imágenes del proceso de creación de Luciana.




Images of our perks.

$115 Ilustration

Alfonso's Perk

$150 Comic

The story that started the process of Luciana.

La historia con la que empezó el proceso creativo de Luciana.

You can see online here... Comic

Puedes verla online aquí.


$150 Children´s Book

"Gabriela and the Monster"

A children's story that talks about respect for other through the vision of a child.

Un cuento infantil que habla sobre el respeto por otros bajo la vision de un niño

History: Sergio Gonzalez

Illustration: Santiago Oliveros

You can see online here...  Grabriela y el Monstruo

Puedes verlo online aqui.

story:
Don’t Play With My Balls


EPIC PROGRESS!!!!


We're MEDLHEADS by day and fanatic, creative, game loving, Voltron watching, Toonami reminescent, game industry pioneers who build things for other people but secretly desire world domination through building our own S&^T!! (Mobile Masterpieces)

This campaign means a lot to us because we want to show the world what we can make and what we are made of (magical things we hope).  It’s not everyday that you get this many like minded individuals to join forces and do something cool.

As a contributor you achieve a greatness like no other, the chance to allow good people to do something they love doing.  If you are in town, we'll even let you ride our Crazy Cart and have a cup of our Joe (wonder why people call it that?).  We need you as bad as you need something cool to play (or play with).

First off, we are going to build the game in the wee hours after we crank out MEDL awesomeness by day. You don’t need to pay us for that.

What we do need is money to properly market the game so that we can get the word out.  One thing we've learned is good games go nowhere unless they are marketed properly.  First, your money will go to marketing the game, the first $25k. At $50k we are going to market even more - and make some cool plushies (Happy Dance!).  At $100k we'll shoot an epic commercial, market more, and do a dance.

If we pass $100k, we'll BLITZ build the game, faster, much faster. Which means we can do the Android version on the same timeline as the iOS version, and we can start building out lots of cool new features as your contributions exceed our initial funding goals. 



We are a team consisting of a grip of solid gamer industry folk.




Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the Word!!!  Love cats or don't love cats.  Either way you'll have fun.
